testcase.name: Verify web page of dailymail application
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Application home page......................................passed Then I Verify the webpage displays current date and time....................passed When I Navigate to the Sport menu...........................................passed When I Click on the Football sub navigation item............................passed Then I Verify primary navigation colour Sport and secondary navigation Football are same.passed And I Click on the first article displayed and traverse to the gallery image.passed And I Click on gallery icon appearing on the right-hand side corner.........passed Then I Verify previous and next arrows buttons..............................passed And I Navigate to a video embedded within the article.......................passed And I Click the full screen button on the right-hand corner of the video....passed When I Click on the Facebook share icon and verify it opens Facebook modal dialog.passed And I Click the full screen button on the right-hand corner of the video....passed And I Click on collapse icon on video.......................................passed And I Click on close icon...................................................passed And I Get "Liverpool" team points...........................................passed And I Get "Liverpool" team position.........................................passed
